content.detailedDescription:
In 1975 i was 12 years old. i was sound asleep on my back on the left side of the bed beside the bedroom door, right beside my younger sister in a full size bed. i am guessing it was after midnight, i never knew what time it was or the exact date.
i was woken up some how, and looked to my left. beside my bed stood 2 men about 3 to 4ft tall. they were side by side and the one furtherest away from me was passing his hands over my abdomen and thigh area not physically touching me. i felt nothing if he did. i was never so terrified in my life. i started frantically moving my eyes around the room, trying to figure out what was happening. i immediately noticed one at the foot of my bed with his back to me looking forward towards a window directly in front of the bed, and he was not moving. i then noticed to my far right, one standing in front of my chest of drawers, picking up and looking at my belongings  and i could hear him putting them back down. a hair brush, mirror and perfume and a few other trinkets. not sure what else was on there. 
i then looked back at the two beside me, the one closes to me never moved, he was just staring straight down at my stomach area. 
i then looked to my far left and noticed one of them, standing at the doorway, it was like he was a look out. he was standing with his arms folded and his legs crossed. he only looked straight ahead into the hallway. 
they all 5 looked identical. dark silver grey color, with hats on. like a fedora hat, all the same color as their skin. no clothes. i could only see human like features of little men. 
only my eyes could move. my body was completely paralyzed. i was shaking and sweating, i could feel the sweat literally pouring off my body in fear. i tried with everything i had to touch my sister, one finger away. but i couldn't even move my finger. 
the man that had his hands over my body was the leader. he told me, "it's ok, it's ok"
this was done telepathically. i did not understand at 12 years old how that happened. i was so shocked i heard him tell me this, in my mind. it seemed like seconds later i was asleep. 
when i woke up in the morning, it was bright and sunny outside. i don't know how much time or what time it was when i woke up. i ran down stairs as fast as i could to tell my mom what had happened to me. i told her exactly this experience. she tried to convince me that it was all a dream. i assured her i was wide awake, and fully aware of what was happening. 
this experience has haunted me for 40 years. i have never told this to anyone outside of my family.
i have had alot of medical problems lately and am now disabled. i never slept all night since then. i now take zquil and wear ear plugs at night, just so i can sleep.
i have also had paranormal experiences most of my adult life. i don't know if they ever come back at night. i can't let my mind go there. 
i don't know if this has anything to do with my experiences, but i am rh negative. no one else in my family is. 
thank you~ i am relieved and terrified for telling this all at the same time.
content.summary: 5 entities in my bedroom in 1975

content.detailedDescription:
I had left gas station on maraposa rd. and munford, by the school. traveling southeast on maraposa rd. heading home to oakdale. about 6:25 pm. it was dark, lightly raining, maraposa is a 2 lane country road. i was a mile past the gas station all fields and orchards. no other cars as i could see several miles ahead of me, but i observed what i thought to be a large, maybe 747 plane commonig in my direction about 2 miles ahead. my first thought was it had to be an antique plane, flying to stockton for a show or something, there is no commercial flight path for miles where i am. as it approached me, it stopped above me and to my left. i stopped my car, turned off radio and rolled down my window and got out of my car, looking up. there was total quiet, but for my car. i observed about 8 lights spaced in the shape of a giant wing, i could see no outlines or anything, just lights, the lights left no reflection on the object they were attached to but i got the visusl impression that something was 
solid, almost as if cloaked,, like my eyes knew there was a solid mass inbetween the lights but yet couldn't see anything. and the odd silence as it hoovered, for about a minute, then the sound of jet engines from nowhere, and it moved and continued its flight towards stockton. i got back in my car, whatever it was, it saw me, because my car lights were the only light in the dark evening as it hovered above me, there are no street lights, just country road. i drove back to the station and told the attendant about it, i stated i wasn't saying it was a ufo. but had they 3 men there, ever seen such. one man emphatically stated it was a drone, i told him it was too big to br unmanned.
  i then went home and researched on the internet a company that was advertising their stealth planes on t.V., northrupt grummond, they show all their drones and other planes they produce, but none of them could have been what i had seen, untill the last plane they show is the ridht size a large wing, but it is under a tarp! you can only see the shape. big secret? we have technology that can silently hover but the jet engines kick in when it moves?
we are always being told that the technology we know of is actually, far behind what we are capible of! i stick by my observation, i did see and hear, a cloaked, or visually hidden wing shaped obje t that did hoover silently. and by wing i am not talking about the triangular shaped planes we have like the blackhawlk?, it was shape long and narrow like you removed the body and engines of a huge jet and stuck them together. no cockpit body, no typical engines either.
content.summary: Lights approaching from southeast comming up valley towards me. upon approach they stopped the wing shaped lights hovered above me. silent. then jet engines started and it continued  on its path toward stockton.

content.detailedDescription:
On wed 19th, 2015 while seated on my deck, i noticed a bright object hanging in the sky. i sat and watched for a period of approx. 5 min.  during this time the object moved left then moved right past original spot, then back to center. i first thought balloon, but concluded it was not based upon movement. at this point i ran into the house to grab a photographic device. i initially had a problem getting the camera to stay on then realized there was no memory card in it. i ran back inside to get memory card, with two
other people in tow.  the object had completely shifted location.  at this time we struggled to get a clear video the object as it would not focus on the background, only the foreground trees.

i am a former meteorologist - navy, this object did not demonstrate the characteristics of an airplane or balloon...And there are no weather stations in this area that i am aware of, lenoir, nc region. 

the object moved in various paths, sometimes motionless, seeming to hang in mid air, making abrupt and erratic movements. i also managed to snap several still photos, in which we discovered another smaller object in the
general vicinity of the larger.

while observing, i noticed a plane go by east to west, this plane was oddly dark in color and flying low altitude. i then refocused on the object.  i noticed another plane, higher altitude leaving a contrail.  i swung the camera to the plane for approx. 10 seconds.  turned to view the object again...Gone.

after observing and recording this object, i was certain this was something outside of the normal. this filled me with excitement at having been looking in the right place at the right time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Circular, bright, and large from my perspective

content.detailedDescription: On saturday evening around 9pm, october 8, 2011, i was walking to the garbage bin outside my condo building and saw what looked like a bright ball of light hanging from the trees ahead. when i looked closer, it wasn't in the trees but in the sky. i moved to a clearing in our parking lot and saw a bright round object in the sky that didn't seem to move...It looked like it was just hanging there...Hovering. i was facing south and am located at i-355 and the maple street exit (in illinois). i waved over a neighbor of mine in the parking lot, and asked him if he saw it too...He did. we then scanned the sky and saw three lights in the distance behind our building and one more to the east of the object that had a red light flashing. none of these moved either. the one we were watching was the closest to us. it was east of the moon on a clear night. it's altitude was higher than a small aircraft (lots of small aircraft fly) but it was much lower than a commercial airplane. i took lots of pictures. during this time frame, about 8 or 9 other people in the condo complex watched it also. since then, this object has been in the sky near my condo on a regular basis. it even has followed me to work in nearby hinsdale, and followed me back home. the pictures attached were taken when i spent a weekend in madison, wisconsin march 27, 2015. the other set was taken at my condo building april 23,2015. it continues to appear in different locations nearby usually s, sw & north. other balls of light are seen at a farther distance and usually are located in a triangle....S, sw & n.
content.summary: Saw a bright ball of light hanging in the air. about 8 or 9 of my neighbors in my condo complex also saw it. it was there all night. nothing in daylight the next day.

content.detailedDescription: May 23, 2015 driving north on oak road bridgeville delaware usa observed crop circle designs on east and west sides of road. large formations in wheat fields. land here is very flat but i did try take a video of the west side field. i have never seen this before and there doesn't seem to be any reported sitings online.
content.summary: Crop circles

content.detailedDescription: Recently bought a farm in michigan city. i was sitting with my cousin in the afternoon by a pond on my property. we were admiring a very tall tree next to the pond.  i positioned my cell phone camera for about 5 secs to get the best frame of the top of the tree. neither of us saw any planes, birds, nor sound in the surrounding sky. after i took the picture i quickly checked to see how it came out and noticed a rather prominent and bizarre object, i said to my cousin, "what is this??" we both we're a bit stunned, in shock , as we did not see any planes and had are eyes on the sky for a good 3- 4mins. my cousin pointed out that there was a strange "glowing aura" surrounding the object.
content.summary: Dark & dense cylinder object appeared only in cell phone picture of a tall tree, michigan city, in.

content.detailedDescription: Friend and i sat out on general store porch late at night talking. noticed huge light on north side of hahn's peak.{lived at base of this mountain in gold mining camp village named columbine cabins}. light got huge and brilliant almost at top of mountain. split into several smaller lights and formed a huge triangle on the top part of the whole mountain very quickly. thought impossible to be any group because late at night, extremely dark, and very dangerous and impossible for anyone to run night or day at speed the lights formed the triangle. had climbed the mountain before and talace rock very slippery and steep where the lights were at during the duration of event. after about 4 min. the light went back to center of the triangle forming a huge ball of light once again, stayed round and very bright for a minute or so and light went out quickly. saw one of your hanger 1 shows on tv. never knew who to report to before seeing your show.
content.summary: main huge light .Changed shape to triangle .Went back to one main light. vanished when light went out.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home (west) on hwy 105 and it was dark. as i approached mccaleb rd i saw several bright reddish lights in a line traveling east. the lights appeared to be closer to the ground than a plane would fly. i believed the lights to be part of a military training exercise at first. the lights passed over me and continued east then lost sight of them. i thought they may be ufos but i didn't see anybody else on the hwy stop so i just continued home. i didn't see anything on the news about the lights and wrote it off until i started watching ufo shows that described these kind of lights.
content.summary: Saw reddish lights in a line travel over me as i drove home

content.detailedDescription: The meek shall inherit the earth.  not a siting sorry, but an epiphany.
content.summary: They intend enslavement

content.detailedDescription: I was in a state of ponder as i sat watching my security cam in one screen particular i focused on this light that appeared as i watched it in its entirety i then rewound to make sure i captured the entire event and it seems i have
content.summary: I was looking at my live feed on my security cams when the event started until the end

content.detailedDescription: I was driving a tractor trailer west bound through phoenix az. all of the sudden the sky in front of me, behind the buildings and other structures, turned the most amazing bright blue color. it only lasted for a few seconds but it covered the entire sky in front of me. it almost looked as if an atomic bomb had been dropped on the city and this was this was the chemical aftermath of the bomb but it only lasted a very short time. i am positive that i am not the only one to have witnessed this.
content.summary: Bright  lights over phoenix arizona.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on a chemtrail photography shoot at sunset. during editing i have pictures of a cloaked ufo next to a chemtrail image. then i noticed it's uncloaked. dark object with a white band around it.A tail or antenna of some sort. round and angled
object. i also have what i think are 2 v shaped black tr3b's in a cloaked status giving off  signatures. from a previous photo shoot.
content.summary: Shooting chemtrail photography didn't notice till editing was cloaked as a cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 8:15 in the evening. i was taking my dog out to the backyard to do her business. she was on a long retractable leash.  so as she was busy, i was star gazing as i usually do. as i was looking for different constellations i noticed something moving.  it was coming from the se. at first i thought it was the shadow of a line of geese. then i realized that it was lights moving and there was no sound. it was at about the height the life flight flies. (they are very loud) it was long and rectangular, with several white lights in a straight line.  the thing that took me a few seconds to realize was that it was "see through".  i was seeing this object move through the sky with edges, an outline, but i was seeing the stars through it! it was strange, because i saw it's lights, saw it's outline, but seeing the stars was like looking through water. they seemed to "bounce" a bit as i watched them. i could see the shape of the object as it moved, but at the same time not see the shape of the object. the one thing that was very obvious was the row of lights moving across the sky. the object moved at a steady, not fast, pace to the nw. then it was gone. i did not see it change direction, it was just not there, or simply no longer visible. as it moved past me, it just vanished. this whole occurrence lasted maybe a minute. 
i was in awe. i couldn't believe what i just saw and that it was so obvious what i just saw. i got goose bumps. i ran inside and called my son, because i knew he would believe me.
content.summary: I could not believe what i was seeing.  i thought,

content.detailedDescription:
Helping a friend with car problems on the access road off ih35
looking up at the clouds checking for possible rain and above the clouds i observed a round dull gray object shoot straight across the sky . it had no wings , no propellers and no sound ..This was my second sighting in less than a month the other was at canyon lake at an outdoor concert at this sighting myself and others observed an orange ball move across the night sky it made a dead stop and just disappeared
content.summary: Staring up at clouds saw something fly overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was about 10 or 11 years old when i was with a friend in my backyard shooting at each other with air soft guns. my friend and i were about 50 yards from each other parallel to the rivers water line. we were roughly 30ft from the edge of the water. i was completely obsorbed into what i was doing at the time which was staying quiet and staying low while i listened for my friend to make any noise to give away his position. it was around 4 o'clock in the afternoon because we had left school not much earlier. as i was sitting there quietly waiting i heard some sticks crack and something move to the right of me. looking anxiously for my friend to be creeping around for me i didn't see anything right away except for some brush and small branches from trees moving in a specific spot. at the time there was no wind and it was braud daylight. i saw a branch snap backward like it was caught on someone's clothing or extremities and that's when i saw it. standing at around 8ft tall with an oval shaped head and what seemed to be joint that were backwards from human joints was a being that was completely translucent. it was difficult to make out at first but once i spotted it i could see everything. i was younger at the time and absolutely terrified and yelled out at it "freeze"! pointing the air soft gun at the creature hoping i could make sure it didn't want to harm me or come near mer it turned from its path into the heavily wooded area it turned and stared directly at me in a bent kneed attack stance. at this point i was in complete shock and i think it knew that as much as i did and we continued to stare at each other. it made a series of several weird noises that i could not describe through text and made a couple of glances to its right at the heavily wooded tree line. it quickly returned to its original path and made a few quick strides toward the woods. still stunned i watched it maneuver past a couple branches ducking and dodging its way through still able to visibly see it's clear holographic figure and then it completely dissapeared not because it was to deep into the woods but it must have been able to control how visible it was some way. even though it was completely invisible at this point i could still see trees and branches moving and being rustled with as it made its way farther and farther until it was gone. i ran as fast as i could screaming in terror into my house explaining to my mom what i had saw with my friend fallowing not to far behind. still to this day the kid i was with completely backs the encounter and my mother remember how frantic and terrified i was. the very scary fact of all of it is that after the incident took place i had no recollection of what happened after running inside my home at that time and still to this day. i never saw it again but did hear many many strange noises coming from outside often and another occurrence took place a couple years later where i witnessed a large black triangle ufo with three orange/red lights at each corner flying about 200ft above my house. it very slowly spinned while hovering with no noise above my home for about 3 to 4 minutes while my brother my friend and i watched and it then took off in an instant straight up at angle until all you could see was what appeared to be a star flicker out into blackness. scary s***! if you have any information on the translucent being that i encountered please share your information because i still am absolutely infatuated with what it was i saw that day.
content.summary: Standoff type scenario when i spotted translucent 8 ft tall being at edge of river observing me

content.detailedDescription: My husband yells for me and the boys and there's a craft in the sky floating around. as soon as we come out to porch it zooms right upto porch maybe 20 feet away and then takes off. we jump in truck and follow this probably 20 minutes as it goes behind and over tree tops but we would cut it off and we're able to keep up. somewhat out of 28 pictures only one came out
content.summary: Came up to us while i porch then backed off, my husband yells for me and kids and we go out . it then zooms right up on porch and bright light my kids backed up against house. then it took off so we jump in truck and follow it for about 25 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Seeing odd blinking ' stars' . strange moving/blinking. doesn't look like any plane/star/satellite/drone/plane etc that i've ever seen in person or videos etc. there are several different things happening
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Odd lights/stars/moving lights

content.detailedDescription:
Felt a little compelled to tell this story as i have really never discussed it with anybody other than immediate family:

blimp shaped but much smaller in diameter and much longer.  had bright light on front of craft, pointed the way craft was headed, but i don't think it was for visual observation because it was fixed and again, pointed parallel to the craft.  when we first saw craft it was landed and then rose about 5 minutes later and proceeded practically over the top of us.  when it was perpendicular to us, it speeded up from approximately 25 mph to uknown.  let me say this; it was a cloudless full moon night and one second it was within a couple hundred yards and the next second it was gone moving extremely fast to the southeast. 
note:  we did not go investigate landing site at the time or ar any time thereafter.  there were two other witnesses, beside myself.  my brother and cousin.  

[location moved/cms/rjl]

note 2:

i own a scada engineering co.And we do scada contracting for the government in several different mediums
content.summary: Blimp sahped with no apparent gondolas, domes, or air foils

content.detailedDescription: We live by march air force base and one night early april my sister was driving in the back road to get home, she noticed a bright ball of light. she thought it was a plane from the base, she wanted to take a picture so ahe pulled over, when she noticed in a blink of an eye it quickly flashed across town and just hovered by a big mountain that has a letter 'm' on it. she called me and told me if i can see it, i went outside (cuz i live kinda sorta that m mountain) i took some pictures and it's been there every other night, just hovers. changes shapes and flaahes lights. i take pictures every other night. it hovers as soon as it hits sunset and just stays there for couple hours. it must be huge cuz i've traveled to covina and it was there, i traveled to colton, ontario ca and still there. i showed it to some friends, they get scared and rather not talk about it. its there every other night and i even went to santa barbara and it was there, looks like a star, but its not cuz its in our atmosphere. please come see it yourself. i've came home late at night, sometimes around midnight or 1 in the morning and its not there. i hot pictures but i'm not a professional, they don't look good on email but if y'all could come see them on my phone you'll see what i'm talking about. thank you.
content.summary: Its been hovering every night till this day for couple hours, still here

content.detailedDescription: Well i was walking across the street at the crosswalk on 19th ave and glendale listening to my music. it was dark around 8:40 maybe 9 o'clock at night. but as i was walking across the street before i got half way this bright white light appeared over the street light like maybe 5 to 10ft over the street lights and i first thought it was a helicopter looking for someone so i took off my headphones and i was expecting to hear a lot of noise or something but i heard nothing.. that got my attention i was very curious to what was flying so close to the street. but as i got curious it stopped and by this time i was across the street almost to the bus stop which had other people there but they seemed not to notice this object in the sky maybe because it made no noise. so as i was looking at it it was like the white light disappeared and now this gold orange color started going around the object it was like one by one it went around the ufo and i saw its black windows i saw something there beside the sky. the gold orange color went around the object hitting one window at a time and i got scared so i called my mom and explain to her wat was going on and it stayed there for like 5 mins maybe more doing the same thing it was like it was watching me and it knew i saw or was seeing it there no one else would look or anything i felt like it was looking at me. so i stayed on the phone tilly bus came which was like a 20 to 30min wait. and the aircraft or object was there for a long time doing its things. than all of sudden it was gone i looked around for it and saw it traveling west which it went all the way down and towards that way is luke air forced based. i watched it go all the way down there and than the object appear to brighten up the whole aircraft now was that gold orange color and i could see the lines in it from the windows and it was just hoovering and flying slowing in one spot down there i thought to myself how can i still see this things this is not something that is from here or that i had ever seen felt or experience. than the bus came so i left and got off the phone with my mama. when i got off the bus i ran home which was like a 5 to 10 minutes run i was frighten i was going to be abducted i felt like it knew i was watching it and it was watching me. i would say this object was the size of a two story house and it was so low tree height barely above the streetlights. and it made no noise and i could see its material it shape and i will never forget this day which was september 19 around 8:30 9 o'clock 2009 i was 17 years old and would never ever forget what took place and how i felt and what occurred was phenomenal and  extraterrestrial. what i saw was a ufo .......
content.summary: The ufo did not make any sound but yet it was so close to me and it had a gold orange color going around it when it was close but has it got far away it remain one color which was gold or orange. it was very scary but yet so real please contact me.

content.detailedDescription: We live by march air force base and one night early april my sister was driving in the back road to get home, she noticed a bright ball of light. she thought it was a plane from the base, she wanted to take a picture so ahe pulled over, when she noticed in a blink of an eye it quickly flashed across town and just hovered by a big mountain that has a letter 'm' on it. she called me and told me if i can see it, i went outside (cuz i live kinda sorta that m mountain) i took some pictures and it's been there every other night, just hovers. changes shapes and flaahes lights. i take pictures every other night. it hovers as soon as it hits sunset and just stays there for couple hours. it must be huge cuz i've traveled to covina and it was there, i traveled to colton, ontario ca and still there. i showed it to some friends, they get scared and rather not talk about it. its there every other night and i even went to santa barbara and it was there, looks like a star, but its not cuz its in our atmosphere. please come see it yourself. i've came home late at night, sometimes around midnight or 1 in the morning and its not there. i hot pictures but i'm not a professional, they don't look good on email but if y'all could come see them on my phone you'll see what i'm talking about. thank you.
content.summary: Its been hovering every night till this day for couple hours, still here

content.detailedDescription: If only someone from mufon would contact me so i can explain every thing that happened with the ufo sightings and they were always after me, and no body else starting august 1988 before hurricane gilbert came on shore! i was working as a security guard in the night shift and that's when every thing happened to me! a nd my question is why me! i saw one ufo and at deferent night's i saw two other and strange things like the light's of police in the bushes and other night's it was like a shape of an egg or something like that! it wabled up and down on the other sideof the fence near the brush! i walked to it with my flash light and there was nothing anymore! as i walked away, it came back! that's strange! one time the ufo started decending like it was going to land, and as i was walking to this srtange thing, it just went up and went away at a very fast speed! it never made any sounds! when it came back it bas just hovering above my car and it went everywhere i went in my car! that happened to me in 1988 and until this day, i don't have any idea of what or who was doing this to me! at that time i reportede to the starr county sherriff and he told me that they were going to chek it out, but til this day i never heard from them anymore! i hope that maybe somebody in mufon can help me! thank you!!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It always came looking for me & onetime they turned  light and aimed it to me inside my car late past midnight, ad i saw another vihecle on the other side of the fence for difrent nights, it looked like an egg shape! never seen it before!
content.locationName: Rio Grande City Tx,-La Ca, Texas

content.detailedDescription: Was stargazing while having a night swim. clear night. i have 10 ft walls around the pool and saw an unusual light to the right of the moon, if you were using a ruler it would be like 4 inches to the right of the moon, but a little lower than the moon, i know, illusion, but i do not know how else to explain. i could only see orange-reddish lights. it was stationary when i was first observing it. orange in color, round in shape, there was a center light and 5 lights, the same in size, circling the center. suddenly the outer orbs separated from the center, and hovered, and a couple darted off in different directions. i jumped out of the pool and ran into the house to get my husband and a camera, when we returned in like 30 seconds, at the most, there was only a few orbs left. the center one and another went in the direction (further west) away from us till they were just pin point, like orange stars, they stayed parallel from one  (one west, one northwest)till one left(the nw one) and one stayed behind. there was an aircraft that approached the area when there was three left and a few more aircrafts entered the same area after they had dispersed at different times. i did not get it on camera because it was happening so fast i did not want to take my eyes off it to operate the camera. a few minutes later the power went out, not sure if that had anything to do with it but it was a clear night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange lights, orb like, one in the center and 5 more surrounding in circle

content.detailedDescription: My brother was teaching me how to ride his bike. we looked up & saw this cigar shaped thing come up over the hill that was to the north of our house outside of llano. it was a hazy bright light form. i was 6 years old but remember it well.  we also saw 5 lights far in the sky one night all in a row move in the opposite direction immediately. nothing at the time or now can manover like those lights did. i do not have video of this event. it accurd about 1962. i was 6 yes old.
content.summary: Cigar shaped hazy light

content.detailedDescription: We were exiting our car, having just returned from baseball game. as i exited drivers door i heard a helicopter flying low. i looked towards the south/west towards anaheim. i noted a helicopter initially, then i saw a small orb (continuous glow) no blinking lights or sound. i quickly to my wife and kids to look up. they all watched the helicopter chasing(following) at closely behind orb. we observed the helicopter chasing orb for about 1-2 minutes before they flew over the hills of chino hills state park. approximately 1 minute after losing sight of the helicopter and orb, a single military jet came from the west heading on the same flight path as both orb and helicopter. it was very interesting, it almost appeared as if the helicopter was escorting whatever the unknown craft was.
content.summary: Exited car, saw a helicopter chasing small orb. about 1min later losing sight. military jet from west heading in same direction of orb and helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: I reported this to mufon indiana over a decade ago. they said at the time that it was the first report they had fielded. a summary is still listed on their site, but whoever wrote it seems to have misunderstood some things. also, it says the report is on file with mufon, but i can't find it on the website here, and no one has ever contacted me to let me know if they had discovered what it was. this is what happened on the nights of tuesday and wednesday january 16-17, 1990 (it was after midnight early in the am) and tuesday, january 30 (31st?), 1990 around midnight. i had been working late that night. i stopped at the apartment my boyfriend shared with some friends before heading home around 12:30 am. i was 19 at the time, but it should be noted that neither myself nor anyone i visited that night was a drinker or drug user. i've never done either. i took st. joe rd. northeast out of town. it was a warm, foggy night with a very low cloud ceiling. no other cars were in the vicinity as i turned onto the "angling road" as we always called it (really the end of antwerp on the west side of schwarz). i hadn't seen anything in the sky before i turned, but of course, i wasn't looking. in 1990, there was nothing on that short stretch of road but scrub forest on the left and farmland on the right. about half of the way to schwarz, i was startled by an unknown flying craft that passed directly over my car, mirroring my path exactly. it overtook my car and continued forward at a steady clip. in my life, i've often looked up at night, seen lights and thought, "is that a plane?" on this night, i took one look and the blood quite literally ran out of my face. i instinctively hit the breaks and rolled my window down, but i was in a daze for a few moments watching it. i also apparently turned the sound on my car radio all the way off without actually turning the radio off. i didn't discover that until several days later. i don't recall hearing any noise of any kind from the craft. i couldn't determine the actual outline of it, but it had one red light in the center that flashed -- not in a garish way, more of a soft pulsing on and off. it appeared much larger than the white lights (6 to 8) encircling it. the white lights did not flash. it's difficult for me to estimate the size of it. the best comparison i can make is that it looked roughly the size of a full moon high in the sky. when it had passed the intersection with schwarz, it seemed to me that it was turning very casually to the right. it kept turning and turning until suddenly i realized that if it kept it up, it could conceivably come back in my direction. without even realizing it, i had all but stopped in the center of the road. that thought shook me from my daze. when i sped up again, and when i came to the intersection, instead of continuing on antwerp as intended towards my parents' house, i did the thing i thought it would least expect. i made a sharp left onto schwartz, driving as fast as was legal north all the way to leo road/state road 1 where i turned left (west), entered leo, and turned left again(south) . i never once looked back. i was fortunate enough to meet up with a semi heading for fort wayne, and i hugged its bumper all the way through cedarville and then west on to the intersection of dupont and tonkel/clinton. my only thought was to get back to the city where there were more people, so i followed the semi southwest on clinton towards fort wayne. by the time i reached the intersection with washington center rd. it was probably a good 20 minutes after the initial sighting, and i was beginning to feel silly. it was late. i just wanted to go home. i turned left, traveling east on st. joe center. rd, then proceeded to get into the left turn lane to go back northeast on st. joe road (again). this was when what appeared to be the exact same craft passed directly over my car a second time. once again it was mirroring my path (and the roadway) perfectly. i was just coming to a stop at the intersection when i saw it. after overtaking me, it continued forward at the same casual pace, tilting slightly as it changed its trajectory towards new haven. i could see wisps of clouds passing underneath it, but the actual shape still wasn't obvious to me. there was at least one other car at the intersection at that moment -- a man heading south into fort wayne on st. joe rd. he was stopped at the light too, and when i saw him, he was leaning forward in his seat, craning his neck to watch the craft as it flew away, so that confirmed to me that this was something out of the ordinary and not just my overactive imagination. just then, a light rain began to fall. i was in a virtual panic at this point even though the craft had continued on, showing no sign of turning back. i decided on the spot not to go home and turned right (south) across two lanes, winding up on the wrong side of a divided road in the process. thank goodness i didn't encounter any cars before i found a crossover. i then turned into the parking lot for the shops and bars just north of canterbury green apartments and sat in my car for at least 15 minutes. people were constantly coming and going even at that hour because of the bars, so it seemed like the perfect place to hide. i was still too scared to go home, so i went back to my boyfriend's apartment (waking everyone up) and told him all about what had happened. he and his friends were very knowledgeable about the military and various kinds of aircraft, so i thought they might know what it was. they did not. i convinced them to let me stay the night there, and i went home the next morning. my parents were understandably very upset about that the next day, but i couldn't tell them the truth about why i didn't come home. i actually expected to see something in the newspaper about it a day or two later, but it was never mentioned. for the next two weeks, i was still very anxious about it, and i didn't like driving after dark. i would often turn my car lights out after crossing schwartz rd in an effort to avoid attracting attention (so long as there was no traffic). i also felt very nervous at bedtime, but i was always able to fall asleep okay. that changed exactly two weeks after the initial sighting. i was at home and had headed to bed around 11:30 pm (?) on tuesday, january 30, 1990. this time, no matter how much i tossed and turned, the anxiety would not allow me to fall asleep. i'm not sure how long i tried, but i think i gave up sometime just before midnight. once again, i had reached the point where i felt i was being ridiculous. i wanted to take my life back once and for all. i got up and marched over to my bedroom window, certain that i would see absolutely nothing there. it was a clear night, much colder than two weeks prior. at first, i didn't see anything. i stood there for a few seconds longer, but before i could laugh and heave a sigh of relief, what appeared to be the same craft appeared in the sky over the tree line, heading at a casual but steady clip west(left to right from my perspective). it was beyond my parents' property, but it was difficult to tell how far. i felt all but positive it was the same craft even though i was seeing it from an angle. i would say it was roughly at the same altitude as well, though it was difficult to judge. that was bad enough, but a moment later, another light caught my eye -- a large single red light which did not flash traveling east (right to left). it seemed to me at the time that they were headed directly for one another. perhaps it was just paranoia, but i was suddenly hit with the feeling that they somehow knew i was watching them. i really didn't want to wait around to see what happened if they met. i closed the curtains, got back in bed, pulled the covers around me, and thought with all my heart, "just go away," over and over again. but you know what they say... "be careful what you wish for". i haven't seen anything like it since. i thought i could just show people my diagram, tell them what had happened, and eventually someone would say, "oh yeah! i know what that is. it's __________." instead, i find that people clam up when i try to have an intelligent conversation about it, so i've more or less given up on that approach. i'm not making any claims about what i saw, but i'm absolutely positive of the details. i made a point to burn them into my memory so that i could accurately describe what i saw for the rest of my life if needs be. i'm well aware that many of those details are less exotic than the ones which surround traditional unidentified flying object sightings. i just want to know what it was once and for all. after my initial fear faded, i made the decision that if i ever saw it or anything else i couldn't identify again, i would not draw those curtains. if i saw it from my car, i would try to follow it as far as i could. i find the "not knowing" part to be far worse than anything that could possibly happen to me. and of course, i would take pictures since we all have cell phone cameras now.
content.summary: Uknown object passed directly over my car mirroring my path twice in same night. saw again 2 weeks later from bedroom window.

content.detailedDescription: This event occurred when i was approximately 12 years old. it happened at home on the farm.  the house and barn were close to each other (barn has since burned), within 50 feet.  i do not even remember walking to the window in the hall.  but i was standing at the window looking out and wondering why it was so bright out there.  it was night time.  it was so bright it looked like when you turn on the lights at a ball field.  on the ground was 3 alien looking figures looking at me and pointing.  i lost time after that.  i do not know how long i was standing at the window or what happened after.  but ever since then i lose track of time so easily.  it scared me and my heart was racing. i was also fascinated-seemed to be drawn to watch them.  no one else in my family saw this.  i have thought of this incident many times since it happened and even now as to why i was picked for this and then to see the ufo so close later (12 years after saw the figures).
content.summary: I woke up and was standing in hall window staring outside as it was so bright-like day.  saw about three aliens looking at me.Don't remember after that.

content.detailedDescription:
#1-outside with dog
#2-dog was looking at object, kept looking even when i tried to call him
#3-another ufo in the area, reports on local radio 94.1 canton
#4-lights stayed in same sequence but did not keep a constant pattern
and was under cloud cover--got smaller quickly and was gone in less than 10 seconds
#5-watched whole time and they don't scare me. we see many objects in this area that are not explainable.
#6-it stayed in same spot that i first saw it until it looked like it went to the west and was gone quickly
content.summary: Red & yellow bottom part orange on top third all equal spaced

content.detailedDescription: I was driving another person home after a party.  was not drinking as i was pregnant.  the time was approximately 1:30 am.  i saw this circular shaped object with many lights on it.  i was pointing to it saying look, look.  what is it?  i pulled the vehicle over, shut the engine off and opened the window.  it was so close i felt like i could touch it.  it was so big, circular, it hummed very quietly and there were so many lights on it.  i was in awe.  we sat there for quite awhile and watched this object.  it seemed to be looking at us also.  it seemed to be there for quite awhile--probably few minutes.  but the time frame seems to be lost.  all of a sudden it quietly and quickly went in a straight line towards a farmhouse.  as it came to the farmhouse it went over it and then disappeared.  my heart was racing and asked the person who was with me about it.  they did not want to believe it was a ufo--said it was a satellite or something. i continued on way home but could not sleep.  at 3 am i looked out my kitchen window and over the bush behind my house i saw the same object again.  it hovered and then disappeared over the bush.  my heart was racing again. wondering why i had seen this and why it came to me again. was it targeting me?  the news report the next day said that a satellite had fallen the night before. but the time they said was a hour earlier.  i did not believe it was a satellite especially since i saw it twice in one night. another person i know saw the same thing and she lived about 20 minutes away from me at the time.
content.summary: Saw close to road travelling on-pulled over onto side of road.  within 50 fit of object--was big.  opened window-heard humming,saw so many lights. hovered there -not sure how long. it took off and went over a farmhouse and disappered.Saw again at 3am.

content.detailedDescription: On a atv trail deep in woods with my friend between kinuso ab and house mnt. my friend came up behind me and alerted me that someone was following us when i looked behind me to the south a orange light 6 feet off the ground was 100 yrds or so was hovering silent for a couple of min then went invisible. spooked me and friend as we knew we were completely alone in very deep wilderness and it could not have been from people. seen something similar same spot hunting as teen years earlier with a friend also
content.summary: Seen a orange light 100yrd away for a couple min then invisable
